Hello, this is my first post and I would like to say that I find this
group very interesting indeed. I am interested in all aspects of Chinese
and Japanese history. 
 
Does anyone know why the Mongols tried to invade Japan ? They must have
had a good reason as they tried twice in the late 13th cent ? 
 
Thanks, Matthew.
